column4: can I not change permissions of something if it is on a seperate partition?  if i can .. what are the filesystemtypes that wont' work w/ it?
you can't change permission on Windows based file systems (FAT/NTFS)
having you home folder on FAT32 probably isn't the best idea
not whole home folder.. just videos/music/docs/downloads

chmod +x $file.bin then probably "sudo ./$file.bin"
